info.name: DuckDuckGo Dark Google Look [Discontinued]
info.description:
This project has been discontinued. 

This account will not be used again, and all styles will remain archived indefinitely.

Thank you to everyone who used the styles.

The last thing I'd like to say,
it was a blast and I wish you all the best! :)

- Linuxcfg
info.additionalInfo:
6/06/2024
This project has been discontinued and will no longer receive updates or fixes.

The Discord Server and the PayPal donation links have been removed.

This account will not be used again, and all styles will remain archived indefinitely.

Feel free to copy the code and republish the style under your own license.

21/09/2020
Fixes due to DuckDuckGo's layout changes.

31/08/2020
Small fixes due to layout changes from DuckDuckGo.

27/11/2019
Removed distracting elements on images and repositioned the resolution display on top while on hover.
Added a PayPal Donation Link. (See Description)

25/11/2019
I added a discord server for easy bug report, requests, questions etc. (See Description)

22/11/2019
Squished a bug that caused a color change on the results page, specifically the URL.

21/11/2019
Added highlight for results on hover.
Added border color to the video results and brightened the text for better readability.
Minor improvements on the search results page.
Squished some bugs.
Rearranged code.

19/11/2019
Autocomplete border height was adjusted to not cut off the last visible search result.
Refined the settings page to match all the themes, the "clear search" and some other elements.
Remade the quick settings on the search page.
Added a section specific for the settings page to avoid overlapping with identical elements on other pages of DuckDuckGo.
Added highlight to result date.
Darker color for bottom borders.
Fixed the "More Results" Button.
Squished some bugs.
Rearranged some code.
Reduced code.

16/11/2019
Completely remade the entire [Settings] page.
Improved the search button.
Renewed the style preview.
Renewed the safe search highlight to match the style.
Removed duplicate code.
Squished some bugs.

03/11/2019
Added a thin scrollbar for Chromium based browsers.
Renewed the scrollbar for Firefox.
Fixed the homepage search input.
Added a red line over the search suggestions.
Renewed the search suggestions border.
Added a highlight to the search suggestions while hovering.
Added borders that work on all DuckDuckGo themes.
Renewed the "More Results" button.
Removed unnecessary code.

27/10/2019
Small improvements (search bar & about page).

24/10/2019
Changed the name from "Dark Google 4 DuckDuckGo" to "DuckDuckGo Dark Google Look".

19/04/2019
Fixed the Google logo that was cut out on the sides.
Brightened some text for better readability.

02/02/2019
Changed the border color from the results that was white, while hovering.

19/10/2018
Removed unnecessary code.
Colored the bottom of the duckduckgo search.
Extended the style.

26/05/2018
Extended the style.

24/09/2017
Style was generally improved.
The teaser was removed.
Extended the style.

21/09/2017
The size of the "Google" logo was updated. It should have the normal size now.  

31/12/2016
General improvements.

25/12/2016
Changed the color of cloud save [Settings Page].
Extended the style.
Fixed some bugs.
